knimeNode.name: Value Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a data table and returns a table with one column containing the selected domain values.

intro.p: Takes a data table and returns a table with one column containing the selected domain values. The selection can also be controlled from a quickfrom (WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
The values that are selected by default.
